backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or state, serving as a placeholder backend.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: homepage with school name, address display, phone number display, and professional educational theme design.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON summary of frontend files describing the main App component, global styles with warm burgundy/gold palette, Tailwind config with educational theme, and empty hooks file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with CSS custom properties defining a monochrome color system using OKLCH values for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx, titled 'Vandey Bharti National Intermediate College Website'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component rendering the school website with header, welcome section, feature cards (Quality Education, Experienced Faculty, Holistic Development), and contact information section.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook managing ICP actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, handling both authenticated and anonymous actors with query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity storage, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Intentionally empty file as the static informational website requires no backend query methods.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind styles with custom OKLCH color variables defining a warm burgundy and gold educational theme for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point setting up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering the App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending default theme with OKLCH color system, custom fonts (Inter, Merriweather), educational color palette, custom shadows, and accordion animations.
project_state.json: Project state file for a school website featuring Vandey Bharti National Intermediate College with contact details and address. Tracks four existing features (homepage, address display, phone number, and professional theme) and one pending feature request.
